channel.title: 发布 on Hugo NexT
channel.description: Recent content in 发布 on Hugo NexT

item.title: Hugo NexT 4.7.3 Release
item.description:
Important

Note: The new version of the Hugo framework has significant changes. The current theme only supports versions between v0.134.0 and v0.145.0.
Special thanks to netizen @JefferyWang for contributing the Twikoo comment component in the new version. However, the example code within this component contains pseudo-key information, which triggers GitHub’s security management requirements and may cause repository submissions to fail. There is currently no other feasible solution. You can only manually click “allow” during the first submission. For more information, refer to: #793
